mapper.select: SELECT * FROM member ORDER BY USER_ID
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member (ID, USER_ID, NAME, PASSWORD, PHONE, EMAIL, BIRTHDAY, GENDER, IMAGE, DISABILITY_CERTIFICATE, IS_DISCOUNTED, ROLE) VALUES (#{id}, #{userId}, #{name}, #{password}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{birthday}, #{gender}, #{image}, #{disabilityCertificate}, 0, #{role})
mapper.update: UPDATE member SET ROLE = #{role} WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}
UPDATE member SET PASSWORD = #{password} WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}
UPDATE member SET IMAGE = #{image} WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}
UPDATE member SET DISABILITY_CERTIFICATE = #{disabilityCertificate} WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}
UPDATE member SET IS_DISCOUNTED = 1 WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}
